message: Shut down for one mistake? They are dead for cryin out loud. People are overreacting. It doesn't change the fact they are dead lol
Thoughts and prayers to the family!!!

Seriously? I Follow a lot of your posts Freeland Jackson, and agree with a great deal of it, but when you say that full disclosure is a must, that implies that she was complicit in her own murder because she didn't do that thing that all cisgenders want us to do, and reveal painful realities so they can feel better about themselves. This may come as a surprise but not all trans women go around trying to trick straight men into sleeping with them. To suggest that we do, is tantamount to victim blaming women who are raped, Or saying that if people would just follow police orders they wouldn't be murdered by their abductors. There is no excuse to murder someone because of how they make you feel. NO EXCUSE, PERIOD. If trans people still make you uncomfortable in this day and age, you are in the same boat with the racist whites that say minorities make their skin crawl. One last thing before I shut up, your comments are attempting to place restrictions on a group of people you are not a part of, you are acting in the same way every hipocritical bigot in this country does.
